summary: The sturdy horse, Liath Macha, from Irish legend. Need a trusty steed who fights beside you, runs fast, and virtually never tires? Liath Macha is your new best friend.
descriptionHtml:
Based around the Irish legend of Cuchulainn, Liath Macha is named after Cuchulainn's trusted horse, which rode into battle with him and was said to have fought beside him and killed thirty men with nothing but its teeth and hooves.

This Liath Macha isn't quite that impressive. Sure, he's sturdy, hard to kill, has incredible stamina, remarkable speed, and levels up with you (for a cap at 81), and he'll even fight alongside you instead of running away or panicking, but it's not like he can cast spells or do tons of damage.

Nonetheless, he's speedy, strong, and brave, and best of all, if you lose track of him or he dies, he'll simply respawn right where you found him - by the lake.Â 

Incidentally, he did that in the myth, too. Geez, mythology battles are so hax, huh?

If I feel up to it, I might add a spell so you can summon him to your side, too, and then hide it in his saddle or something.

Installation is a breeze - use NMM or just paste the .esp file into your Skyrim/Data folder. He should cooperate with any other mod fairly well, and there shouldn't be any problems, no matter what version of Skyrim you're running.

Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3200/?]Ornate Saddles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19936/?]More Saddles[/url]
author: EmperorTaihaku
